message: This requires an Android device, and as such, it kinda requires an unnecessary extra step. I really think the next hot platform after Arduino is going to be ARM-based embedded systems. Let's see what the Google TV hardware looks like.
Official goog specs link here to purchase the board, for 35,000 yen(?) which is $389 (?) http://www.rt-shop.sakura.ne.jp/rt-shop/index.php?main_page=product_info&products_id=2731&language=en
Libraries and where to get the hardware: http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/usb/adk.html
Official kit from the Google IO event, for the low-low price of $500 http://cgi.ebay.com/Android-Open-Accessory-Development-Kit-brand-new-/270748345608
